actions.name: Magic Bounce

cost.trigger: The user is hit by a Status-Category Attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by a Status-Category Attack.

Effect: The triggering attack fails to hit the user, and the triggering creature is instead targeted and hit with the triggering attack, applying the effects to themself.
